name: Letter from Lipsius, Justus to Clusius, Carolus, 1601-04-24

Diplomatic.text: I[ustus] Lipsius Carolo Clusio S[alutem] D[icit]. Scripsi nuper, gratias egi, idem nunc usurpo. Quid iteratione opus, nisi quia tuae litterae post donum advenerunt, ipso gratiores! Nam in iis caussa donationis erat, verus et fidus ille amor, quem ut coli a te gaudeo, ita a me idem nuncio, nec hoc mutabo in omni etiam rerum mutatione aut ruina. Macte autem animi et industriae senex, qui de altero tertioque tomo cogitas et concinnas, grato utilique nobis labore, qui Naturae illas delicias et vere paradeivsou" amamus et lustramus. Ego Epistolas nuper edidi, sed titulus indicat serium aut magnum nihil esse. Tamen mitto, brevi et alias, in quibus memoria certe impressa amicitiae nostrae. Quam (ut in eo desinam) sanctam mihi et intemeratam semper fore, testor illum eius praesidem Deum. Vale, mi Clusi, et publico diu vive. Lovanii, VIII Kal[endas] Maiias M.DCI. [Clusii manu:] 1601. I[usti] Lipsii Lovanio, VIII Kal[endas] Maias ad meam V Id[us] April[es]. Accepi Leydae, IV Idus Maias cum Centuria III Epist[olarum]. Respondi pridie Kal[endas] Aug[ustas].

annotations.text: nuper: ILE XIV, 01 03 26, in which Lipsius expresses his gratitude for a copy of Clusius' book.
senex: According to the Ad. lect., f. *3v of his Rariorum plantarum historia, dated on 1 February 1601, Clusius was then 75 years old.
altero: This second tome appeared four years later: Exoticorum libri decem, Leiden: F. Raphelengius, 1605,

alias ... memoria: In the five Centuriae published in 1602 Clusiusâ€™s name occurs twice, scil. in Cent. misc. [1602], 16 (= ILE VII, 94 12 30 L) and Cent. Belg. III, 42 (= ILE XI, 98 02 22 L). Lipsius also included him in the posthumously published Cent. misc. IV (letter 36, = ILE XV, 02 09 28).
litterae: Clusius's letter, dated 9 April, is not preserved.
Epistolas: Sc. the Epistolarum selectarum centuria miscellanea tertia, later to be published as Epistolarum Centuria ad Italos et Hispanos. The first two Centuriae were reprinted as well.

metadata.value: University Library Leiden, ms. Vulc. 101 (L); cl: ibid., ms. Lips. 3(4), f. 141
